DOC.brief_summary: IVF well-established method treat various cause infertility . Some study suggest ethnicity affect success IVF . This prospective study involve two tertiary IVF unit Hong Kong Australia . The IVF outcome Chinese Caucasians compare .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Number Oocytes Obtained Between Chinese Caucasian Women IVF Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective study conduct two tertiary IVF unit Hong Kong Australia . The target population trial woman undergo IVF intracytoplasmic sperm injection ( ICSI ) treatment two IVF Units . Intervention : Patients recruit study undergo IVF+/-ICSI treatment . They undergo ultrasound scan second third day ( day 2 3 ) period exclude presence ovarian cyst antral follicle count determine , include follicle 2-10 mm measure 5.5-7.5mHz transvaginal ultrasound probe . Blood check anti-mullerian hormone ( AMH ) measure Beckman-Coulter Diagnostics . Ovarian stimulation start ovarian cyst ultrasound scan . They receive one long act gonadotrophin injection Elonva 150 microgram subcutaneously follow daily gonadotrophin injection ( Puregon ) 200 IU antagonist protocol . Antagonist ( orgalutran 0.25 mg ) start day 5 ovarian stimulation . Transvaginal ultrasound perform follicular track 7 day Elonva injection every 1-3 day thereafter . No adjustment FSH dose allow . Cycles cancel less 3 follicle large 18mm one week 200 IU Puregon develop follicle ( i.e . large 11mm ) one week 200 IU Puregon . Recombinant hCG ( Ovidrel , Serono , Bari , Italy ) 0.25mg give 2 follicle > 18 mm diameter . Gonadotrophin injection give day hCG . Agonist trigger use oestradiol concentration day trigger great 15,000 pmol/L 15 follicle > 16mm transvaginal scanning . All embryos blastocyst freeze transfer later follow agonist trigger number oocyte aspirate 20 . Serum FSH , oestradiol , LH progesterone concentration take 7 day Elonva injection hCG trigger day . Transvaginal ultrasound-guided oocyte retrieval ( TUGOR ) schedule Mondays , Wednesdays Fridays , 34-36 hour hCG injection . Flushing follicle perform . Follicular fluid contaminate blood collect first large follicle side estradiol progesterone level . The retrieved oocyte inseminate conventionally ICSI , depend semen parameter . ICSI advise total motile sperm number sperm preparation < 0.2 million , sperm morphology strict criterion < 3 % fertilization rate < 30 % previous IVF cycle conventional insemination . One two embryo replace day 2-5 oocyte retrieval . Luteal phase support start accord standard protocol centre . Patients follow urinary pregnancy test 16 day embryo transfer . Patients positive pregnancy test transvaginal ultrasound scan perform 10-14 day later refer antenatal care 8-10 week gestation . The remain embryos frozen . Pregnancy outcome monitor .
DOC.criteria: Women age 1836 year old Body weight > 60Kg Total antral follicle count > =7 â‰¤ 20 i.e . poor ovarian reserve base Bologna criterion Chinese woman HK centre Caucasian woman ( defined originate United Kingdom , Europe United States America , exclude Middle East ) Australian centre Written inform consent Mixed race/ ethnicity History ovarian surgery Body mass index > 35 kg/m2 > 2 previous stimulate IVF cycle History ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome previous stimulate IVF cycle Polycystic ovary syndrome total antral follicle count > 20
